Flow.description: This flow allows any user to create a case of any type. Can create a case for customer service, a ticket for IT department or submit refund request.
Flow.interviewLabel: Screen Flow: Global Create Case Flow {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}

fields.name: displayErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong


Error Message:

{!ErrorMessage}

fields.name: headerMissingInfo
fields.fieldText:
No Order Selected


Please return to the previous screen and make sure to select which Order you want to request a refund for.

fields.name: plCategory
fields.helpText:
Customer Service

  • Sends the case to the Customer Service Team

Technical Issue

  • Creates a ticket for the IT Department

Refund Request

  • Depending on the size of the request, the ticket is sent to either Customer Service or your Country Manager

value.stringValue: Please provide a brief description of why you're submitting this case

fields.name: displayLeadInfomation
fields.fieldText:
Name: {!Action_Flow_Lead_Information_Getter.Results.outputLeadRecord.FirstName} {!Action_Flow_Lead_Information_Getter.Results.outputLeadRecord.LastName}

Phone: {!Action_Flow_Lead_Information_Getter.Results.outputLeadRecord.Phone_Formatted_No_Spaces__c}

Email: {!Action_Flow_Lead_Information_Getter.Results.outputLeadRecord.Phone_Formatted_No_Spaces__c}

fields.name: displayAccountInfomation
fields.fieldText:
Name: {!Action_Flow_Account_Information_Getter.Results.outputAccount.Name}

Phone: {!Action_Flow_Account_Information_Getter.Results.outputAccount.Phone_Formatted__c}

Email: {!Action_Flow_Account_Information_Getter.Results.outputAccount.PersonEmail}

fields.name: displayAccountRefundInfomation
fields.fieldText:

Email: {!Action_Flow_Generate_Refund_Request.Results.outputAccount.PersonEmail}
